trans-unit.source: Represents a cell column in a legend, which is used to extend the functionality of the default legend.
Any number of cell columns can be placed in any order, which gives you the flexibility to extend the abilities of the default legend entries.
The legend cell columns are only applicable to items that are automatically generated from series or data points.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn"></xref> class with the specified header text, column type and column cell text.
The text for the legend cell column header.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the legend cell column type.
The text for the legend cell column.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn"></xref> class with the specified header text, column type, column cell text and content alignment.
The text for the legend cell column header.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the legend cell column type.
The text for the legend cell column.
The legend column content alignment.
Gets or sets the legend column content alignment.
This property is used to align text or series symbols within the legend cell column.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the alignment of the legend cell contents.
The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
Gets or sets the background color of the legend cell column.
This property overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.BackColor%2A> property of the legend that the legend cell column belongs to.
It also overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.InterlacedRows%2A> property of the legend.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the legend cell column background.
The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Gets or sets the legend cell column type.
This property determines the type of content that will be displayed in each individual legend cell column.

There are two possible values: - Text: By default, the #LEGENDTEXT keyword is used to place the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties.LegendText%2A> value in each cell column.
However, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.Text%2A> property to set any keyword(s) that will be replaced by a value of the corresponding series.
- SeriesSymbol: The legend cell will contain a series symbol, such as a rectangle, line, line with marker, or marker, of the same fill color as its corresponding series.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the legend cell column type.
This value represents the type that will be used to define the legend cell column contents.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets the font for the legend column text.

This property is only applicable when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType>, and a `string` value is defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.Text%2A> property.
You can use the Font property to set font properties of the legend cell column.
If you attempt to change the properties of this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object at run time, a compilation error will occur.
To set font properties at run time, you must create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object that specifies the font for the legend column text.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the text color of the legend cell column.

This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the legend cell column text.
The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Gets or sets the horizontal text alignment of the legend cell column header.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.StringAlignment"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the horizontal text alignment of the legend cell column header.
Gets or sets the background color for the legend cell column header.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the background of the legend cell column header.
The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Gets or sets the font used in the legend column header.
This property can be used to set font properties of the legend cell column header.
If you attempt to change the properties of this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object at run time, a compilation error will occur.
To set font properties at run time, you must create a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object that represents the font used in the legend column header.
The default value is "Microsoft Sans Serif, 8pt, Bold".
Gets or sets the color of the legend column header text (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn.HeaderText*> property).
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that specifies the color of the legend column header text.
Gets or sets the text for the legend cell column header.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the legend cell column header text.
The default value is a zero-length string.
Gets the legend in which this legend cell column belongs.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object that represents the legend which this legend cell column belongs to.
Gets or sets the margins of the legend cell column.
This property is measured as a percentage of the legend font size.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Margins"></xref> object that represents the top, bottom, left, and right values of the legend cell margins.
The default values for top, bottom, left and right are "0,0,15,15".
Gets or sets the maximum width of the legend cell column.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the maximum width of the legend cell column.
The default value is minus one (-1), which means that the maximum width is automatically calculated.
Gets or sets the minimum width of the legend cell column.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the minimum width of the legend cell column.
The default value is minus one (-1), which means that the minimum width is automatically calculated.
Gets or sets the name of the legend cell column.
The name of the legend cell must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown.

The Name property can be used as the indexer when retrieving a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumn> object from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnCollection>.
If you set this property to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the text name of the legend cell column.
Gets or sets the size of the series symbol displayed in a legend cell column.
The size of the series symbol is measured as a percentage of the legend font size.

This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> object that represents the size of the series symbol.
The default values for the width and height of the symbol are 200 and 70, respectively.
Determines whether the property should be serialized.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if property should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the text of the legend cell column.

This property is only applicable if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellColumnType>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the text for the legend cell column.
The default value is a zero-length string.
Gets or sets the tooltip text for the legend cell column.
If the `ToolTip` property is set for both a legend item and a legend cell, the legend cell property has precedence.
This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip for the legend cell column.
The default value is a zero-length string.
